id.description: A UUID, unique across servers, representing this entity.

entityName.description: username@server.tld, used for human-readable references to the user and DNS-based discovery.

contact.description: UUID for the Contact document containing profile data.

keypair.description: Keychain for public/private keys associated with this entity.

created.description: ISO-8601 timestamp with zone for when this entity was first created.

updated.description: ISO-8601 timestamp with zone for when this entity was most recently updated.
